alert.note: Alert for East Feliciana; Pointe Coupee; West Feliciana (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 16 at 4:56PM CDT until July 16 at 6:00PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: The National Weather Service in New Orleans has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... West Feliciana Parish in southeastern Louisiana... Northeastern Pointe Coupee Parish in southeastern Louisiana... Northwestern East Feliciana Parish in southeastern Louisiana... Wilkinson County in southern Mississippi... Southwestern Amite County in southern Mississippi... * Until 600 PM CDT. * At 455 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located near Dolorosa, or 23 miles south of Natchez, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Jackson, St. Francisville, Centreville, Woodville, Gloster, Norwood, Wakefield, Lettsworth, Spillman, Fort Adams, Dolorosa and Crosby. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Large hail and damaging winds and continuous cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning.

area.areaDesc: East Feliciana; Pointe Coupee; West Feliciana
